EmailTemplate.name: 2016Q3.Global.NUR.2034.Small Cells.Email 4 - High Capacity MBB for Mass Events
EmailTemplate.subject: Put high capacity back into mobile broadband at mass events
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Small cells deliver massive capacity at mass events and public indoor spaces Network densification with small cells
Deliver high capacity mobile broadband at mass events Smartphones and tablets create need for network densification by enabling more users to share experiences, download information, and demand huge capacity at mass events. Download the whitepaper <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2048.High.Capacity.Mobile.Broadband.for.Mass.Events.html]]> ► A very large number of users in a small area create massive downlink and uplink traffic and generate significant network planning challenges at mass events.
Nokia’s portfolio of mobile broadband solutions enables operators to provide high capacity service at mass events.
Deliver the best indoor mobile broadband user experience Eighty percent of all mobile broadband traffic is consumed indoors. Discover deployment strategies that deliver capacity and the best indoor user experience. Download the whitepaper <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2049.Indoor.Deployment.Strategies.Whitepaper.html]]> ► © 2016 Nokia.
